name: Sonicomi
description: Super Sonico is a cheerful, hardworking college student and amateur musician who's about to make her modeling debut. As her personal photographer, you will be responsible for Sonico's image, balancing the needs of your clients with your own vision for Sonico's future.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Процессор: 2.4Ghz Dual-Core Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Версии 9.0c Место на диске: 4 GB

reviews.review_text: Before the game started it asked me if I was good at FPS games and I thought to myself what does that have to do with anything since this is a VN. Once I got to the camera sections I see now why it asked. You gotta be quick and move fast if you want to line up those perfect shots at the right angles.
five minutes in and I've already blown my load twice. 10/10

I went in not really expecting much at a glance and with absolutly no knowledge of sonico's character. My only impressions were: 'that it 'looked fun' from a lets play video I watched.'  I must say that I was not expecting the quality of this game to be as good as it is.  The artwork and visuals in Sonicomi are fantastic; backed up by an absolutly beautiful soundtrack that matches the mood and the emotion of the characters on screen perfectly. Then there are the characters themselves who are very fun and full of life.  As someone who enoys FPS games and has played a lot of visual novel titles, I highly recomend Sonicomi to those who enjoy these two things. You will not be disapointed.

Pokemon + Cute anime girl = This game  Gameplay is super fun and the game has a high replay value. Would recommend especially if you are a fan of Sonico-Chan <3  Buy it even if you don't know who Sonico is, you will thank me later :)

Originally started off with the 8th ending, not expected it much, then I went working on the endings for the main horizontal axis of the endings board, some really funny, others extremely cringy and quite a few very heartworming. But when I reached the true ending, I geniunely cried, the story is so touching that I think I could easily play it again... especially considering that I think that there are a couple secret endings I want to get to...  So I recommend you get the game for the photshoots that are extremely fun, even on hard(which I did for every run as soon as I unlocked it), for the enveloping story and the good and bad moments. Nitroplus+ I take my hat off at you, you have done such an excellent job making this game that I think its the best one I've played up to date and possibly for a long time. Do not stop with this excellent work, keep making great games like this one.
oh shjt ... this is too much .... can't handle my hands ... xd
I honestly had no idea what I was doing during the photoshoot on my first playthrough.
I don't think I'll be able to ever leave the comfort of my own home ever again. Unless I get kicked out of course, then I don't know.
As a fan of Super Sonico, I'm in freakin' heaven.
Its fun, its sexy and its addicting.

This is by far the best game I have ever played. Hands down. I have spent every wakeing hour with Sonico and I plan to marry her within 14 hours of my next playthrough. I wish for the best between me and this game and that I could embrace my feelings in real life. I enjoy long walks on the beach with Sonico and we are the best of partners. I make sure I tuck in my Senpai Sonico body pillow every day and kiss it goodnight ;3. I reccomend this game to any serious Sonico fans and I wish that all newcomers purchase this game and enjoy the emotions that surge through my wrist as I take photots of Sonico on the set. This game has been an absolute life-changing experience and I hope on my 68th playthough I can unlock the secrets of Sonico and become a living Sonico Master.
I wanted another reason for my family to throw in the trash can, they got me my own junkyard reserved in Detroit.
